name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】魔法少女ホロウィッチ！THE STAGE【#ホロウィッチ】 [WV2_cgUA8cc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'On your side' by the Holowitch members.
An after-story scene in an office hallway.
Ending credits with the full version of 'On your side'.

subtitles.original: 未来を取り戻そう
subtitles.english: Let's reclaim the future

subtitles.original: 何度だって　笑って
subtitles.english: No matter how many times, let's smile

subtitles.original: もう一回　歩きはじめよう
subtitles.english: Let's start walking one more time

subtitles.original: ホロウィッチ on your side
subtitles.english: Holowitch on your side

subtitles.original: 夢の先へ
subtitles.english: To the other side of our dreams

subtitles.original: あれ？私...
subtitles.english: Wait? I...

subtitles.original: あ、先輩！すいません！
subtitles.english: Ah, Senpai! I'm sorry!

subtitles.original: こっちの作業はまだ終わってなくて...
subtitles.english: This work isn't finished yet...

subtitles.original: だよね。あれ多分期日延ばしても
subtitles.english: Right. I don't think extending that deadline

subtitles.original: 後ろに影響出ないと思うから、話し通しとくね。
subtitles.english: will affect things later, so I'll talk to them.

subtitles.original: え？いいんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh? Is that okay?

subtitles.original: どうしようかと思ってたんです、本当。
subtitles.english: I was really wondering what to do.

subtitles.original: いいよいいよ。お互い無理せず。
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's fine. Let's both not overdo it.

subtitles.original: でも、全力で頑張ろう。フルキャストでね！
subtitles.english: But let's give it our all. With a full cast!

subtitles.original: フルキャスト？って何です？
subtitles.english: Full cast? What's that?

subtitles.original: 頑張るぞ！っていうおまじない...かな？
subtitles.english: A lucky charm to say... "let's do our best," maybe?

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you

subtitles.original: We can spell on your side
subtitles.english: We can spell on your side

subtitles.original: 始まりを告げる　鐘の音が響く
subtitles.english: The sound of the bell signaling the beginning resonates

subtitles.original: 気付いた時がいつだって　スタートラインなんだ
subtitles.english: The moment you notice is always the starting line

subtitles.original: 何者でもなかった　日々を変えたのは
subtitles.english: What changed the days when I was nobody

subtitles.original: 見つけたばかりのちっぽけな　輝きの原石
subtitles.english: was a tiny, newly found gemstone of brilliance

subtitles.original: どうして私だけ　上手くいかないんだろう
subtitles.english: Why am I the only one for whom things don't go well?

subtitles.original: 眩い世界の全てが　眩しく見えるけど
subtitles.english: Everything in this bright world looks dazzling, though

subtitles.original: ねえ君に　見つけてほしくて
subtitles.english: Hey, I wanted you to find me

subtitles.original: なりたい私になる　今こそ
subtitles.english: To become the me I want to be, right now

subtitles.original: そう叶えたい　掴みたい　夢があるから
subtitles.english: Yes, because there's a dream I want to fulfill, to grasp

subtitles.original: 塞ぎ込んだ日の言葉も　全て踏み出すんだ
subtitles.english: Even the words from those downcast days, I'll step out with them all

subtitles.original: 信じる力が　奇跡を起こすように
subtitles.english: So that the power of belief may work a miracle

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you

subtitles.original: We can spell on your side
subtitles.english: We can spell on your side

subtitles.original: 叶えた望みと　変わらない願い
subtitles.english: The fulfilled wishes and the unchanging desires

subtitles.original: それぞれが等しく　流れてく世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where each flows equally

subtitles.original: 何を求めて　歩き続けてるんだろう
subtitles.english: What am I seeking as I keep walking?

subtitles.original: いつもそんなことばかり　迷うけど
subtitles.english: I'm always lost in thoughts like that, but

subtitles.original: 君がくれた　この空が
subtitles.english: This sky you gave me

subtitles.original: 見えない翼を　くれたね
subtitles.english: gave me invisible wings

subtitles.original: そう照らしたい　届けたい　人がいるから
subtitles.english: Yes, because there's someone I want to illuminate, to reach

subtitles.original: 一人取り残された日も　そう決めたんだ
subtitles.english: Even on days when I was left all alone, I made up my mind

subtitles.original: 愛したい　応えたい　自分自身の声に
subtitles.english: I want to love, to respond to the voice within myself

subtitles.original: 正解なんて　これでいい
subtitles.english: Correct answers? This is fine

subtitles.original: 未体験の先へ
subtitles.english: To the edge of the unexperienced

subtitles.original: どんな場所でもいいよ
subtitles.english: Any place is fine

subtitles.original: どんな姿でもいい
subtitles.english: Any form is okay

subtitles.original: 追いかけたいんだ　あの煌めきを
subtitles.english: I want to chase after that sparkle

subtitles.original: 希望、光、痛み、全て
subtitles.english: Hope, light, pain, everything

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて　持っていこう
subtitles.english: I'll embrace them and carry them along

subtitles.original: ほら繋げたい　広げたい　未知があるから
subtitles.english: Look, because there's an unknown I want to connect, to expand

subtitles.original: ここから始まる物語を　一緒にいこう
subtitles.english: Let's go together on the story that begins from here

subtitles.original: 信じる力が　奇跡を起こすように
subtitles.english: So that the power of belief may work a miracle

subtitles.original: この手握って　一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Take this hand, because you're not alone

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you

subtitles.original: We can spell on your side
subtitles.english: We can spell on your side
